Class GiftCertificateController

  • Method Details

    • getCertificateById

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping({"/","/{id}"}) public List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate> getCertificateById(@PathVariable(required=false) String id) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation
      Returns all GiftCertificates found in Database or specific GiftCertificate if ID is provided
      Parameters:
      id - Optional given ID to filter and return specific GiftCertificate
      Returns:
      List of/Single GiftCertificate/s
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered

    • getCertificateByTagName

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping("/byTagName/{tagName}") public List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate> getCertificateByTagName(@PathVariable("tagName") String name)
      Filter function used to retrieve a List of GiftCertificates based on Tag name
      Parameters:
      name - Tag's name used to filter
      Returns:
      List of GiftCertificates

    • getCertificateByNameDescription

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping("/byPart/{part}") public List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate> getCertificateByNameDescription(@PathVariable("part") String part)
      Filter function used to retrieve a List of GiftCertificates based on part of name or description
      Parameters:
      part - Part of name or description that will be used to filter
      Returns:
      List of GiftCertificates

    • getCertificateByDateOrName

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping("/byDateOrName/{sortBy}/{order}") public List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate> getCertificateByDateOrName(@PathVariable("sortBy") String sortBy, @PathVariable("order") String order)
      Filter function used to retrieve a List of GiftCertificates based on name or date, in ascendant or descendant order
      Parameters:
      sortBy - Parameter given to sort by, either Date or Name
      order - Order in which is needed to sort list, ascendant or descendant
      Returns:
      List of GiftCertificates

    • saveGiftCertificate

      @PostMapping public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate saveGiftCertificate(@RequestBody com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate giftCertificate)
      Will save a GiftCertificate into Database
      Parameters:
      giftCertificate - GiftCertificate Object which will be saved
      Returns:
      GiftCertificate object saved into Database

    • updateCertificateTags

      @PatchMapping("/updateTags/{certId}") public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate updateCertificateTags(@PathVariable("certId") String certId, @RequestBody List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.Tag> tags) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.BaseException
      Will patch new Set of Tags to be linked to a GiftCertificates
      Parameters:
      certId - Certificate ID to apply the patch for
      tags - Tag list to be added to specific GiftCertificate
      Returns:
      GiftCertificate after being patched
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.BaseException

    • updateGiftCertificate

      @PatchMapping("/{certId}") public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate updateGiftCertificate(@PathVariable("certId") String id, @RequestBody Map<String,Object> patch) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation
      Will patch only specified changes into GiftCertificate excluding Tags
      Parameters:
      id - ID of GiftCertificate to which will be applied the patch
      patch - Desired changes to apply
      Returns:
      GiftCertificate after patched without Tags being patched to it
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered

    • deleteCertificate

      @DeleteMapping("/drop/{id}") public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.GiftCertificate deleteCertificate(@PathVariable String id) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation
      Deleting function of a specific GiftCertificate
      Parameters:
      id - Specific ID of GiftCertificate to be deleted
      Returns:
      GiftCertificate which was deleted
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered
